name: CLOCKWORK KINGDOM
description:
ESCAPE FROM THE TOY FACTORY!

You are a clockwork toy who has gained consciousness, you must break free from the prison of the toy factory by uncovering various items, abilities & secrets in this 1-bit mini dungeon-crawler.

Supports gamepad and keyboard control.

Around 1-3 hours of gameplay.

Credits:

Jamie Rowan (@jamierowan_) - Developer/Artist/Animator/SFX

Bibiki (@bibikiGL) - Music

Pixelated Pope (@Pixelated_Pope) - Palette Shader
